_source.short_desc: Lead and task management, two-way communications, email and text templates, unlimited landing pages, parent-scheduled tours, dashboards
_source.long_desc: Grow your center and save time with ChildcareCRM. Our web-based software is built for childcare centers to easily track and follow up on leads from inquiry to enrollment. If you're managing family contact information and communications with spreadsheets and paper, there's a better way that can save you more than 7 hours per week. Organize family info in one place. Capture more leads. Never miss another lead with personalized, automatic emails and texts. Get the most out of your marketing spend.
_source.target_audience: Childcare organizations in the US, Australia, and Canada. More than 4,000 customers and counting.

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Lead Capture
category_features.definition: Automatically identify and save contact information for potential customers

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Lead Segmentation
category_features.definition: Divide leads into buckets based on predefined criteria and routing rules

category_features.name: Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. With Salesforce Lead Management, set up automatic lead scoring and routing to ensure leads never fall through the cracks, and that the right sales reps follow up on leads while they're hot.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Increase lead conversion rates by 300% with Zoho CRM's online, omnichannel lead management system for businesses of all types & sizes.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM helps businesses track prospects, boost lead conversion convert rates by 300%, and shorten sales cycles. Zoho CRM offers a centralized platform to manage lead history, management, distribution, nurturing, and segment high-quality leads based on trends and performance. Access dashboards and connect with your team in real-time with mobile-first features. Zoho CRM integrates with 40+ native apps and 500+ third-party apps.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement lead management software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Tracking leads and optimizing your sales pipeline has never been easier thanks to Pipedrives powerful yet agile lead management software. Focus on the activities that transform leads into customers while enjoying Pipedrives intuitive and simple design. In addition to being integrable with hundreds of supporting lead generation apps and integrations, our robust mobile CRM allows you to continue managing and converting prospects with full feature access on the go.

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: 130,000+ customers in 170 countries use ActiveCampaign to automate their marketing, from contact management to email personalization.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's category-defining customer experience automation platform (CXA) helps over 130,000 businesses in 170 countries meaningfully engage with their customers. The platform gives businesses of all sizes access to 500+ pre-built automations that combine email marketing, marketing automation and CRM for powerful segmentation and personalization across social, email, messaging, chat and text. Over 75% of ActiveCampaign's customers use its 850+ integrations.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: #1 CRM Software for managing lead flow.
related_products.features: #1 CRM Software For Lead Management - 100% Free Forever. Marketing 360 CRM gives you that ability to manage all your leads & customers in one place. Add as many team members as you need, create custom fields to store any contact information, assign tasks, track deals, and sales pipelines and so much more. Need help importing contacts and get live support that is included as well.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite let's you manage your customers' entire lifecycles from lead all the way to fulfilment and beyond, all in a single place.
related_products.features: NetSuite provides a unified, 360-degree view of the customer including preferences, transactions, and interactions to enables sales, marketing, and support teams. With real-time visibility across the entire customer lifecycle-from lead all the way through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, and support, NetSuite users have everything they need to deliver consistent and relevant experiences to their customers across all touchpoints.

related_products.short_desc: SharpSpring offers powerful, flexible lead management with fully integrated CRM and social media tools for easy lead management.
related_products.features: SharpSpring is a comprehensive lead management and marketing automation platform with robust features, functionality and performance. SharpSpring is one of the most flexible platforms on the market, offering powerful, behavior-based email marketing, native or 3rd-party CRM integration, dynamic forms, fully integrated social media management, and universal CMS compatibility, in addition to integration with hundreds of applications. SharpSpring is usually less than 1/3 the cost of the competition.

Bring out the Tiger in your sales team with a highly intuitive, easy-to-use suite of Sales Enablement and CRM tools that help sales professionals focus on hunting and closing leads. TigerLRM comes fully equipped with built-in features and tools that cut down on sales guesswork and presumptions.

With Outreach Engage, leads are appropriately routed to reps and entered into personalized sequences that utilize proven playbooks & messaging. Help your reps more easily engage with potential buyers by orchestrating all key sales activities like email, phone calls, and social media touches.

The integrated systems track each customer interaction, alerting sales when lead scores indicate readiness.

Get 50 Free Lead Credits with New Signup or Request a 1-1 Demo with our sales team!

similar_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.

It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

similar_products.short_desc: Close more leads in less time by following up with leads quickly and efficiently.

ClickPoint provides one solution that makes it easy for salespeople to dial their prospects, while automated Texting and Email marketing reach customers at the right time in their buying journey. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Commission software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Commission tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Commission software improves sales productivity by centralizing and automating an organization's commission-based incentive plans. Commission applications allow performance tracking and reporting among employees, calculation of commission compensation based on performance variables and the management of key dates in the company's sales or compensation cycle. Commission tracking software can also help manage regulatory reporting requirements related to compensation or bonuses. Commission software is related to Lead Management software, Payroll software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quoting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quoting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quoting software enables organizations to accurately calculate cost and price estimates quickly and efficiently. Quote Management applications also allow enterprise-wide distribution of quotes, enabling automatic pricing based on historical records as well as easy integration of localized factors, including customer profiles, case-specific terminology and sales tax rates. Many Quoting applications integrate directly with an organization's accounting activities, enabling the automatic conversion of price quotes to invoices. Quoting software is related to Accounting software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Referral software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Referral tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Referral software helps companies promote their service more effectively by using their customer base as a source for additional sales leads. Typical features of this software include referral tracking, reward distribution and testimonial management. Specific kinds of Referral software are targeted toward Human Resource departments and help establish employee referral programs and lower an organization's cost-per-hire. For related software solutions see Marketing Automation software, Lead Management software, Human Resource software and Customer Reference Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 child care software: Contactless attendance, ongoing parent communication, digital reports, seamless payments, and more.
related_products.features: GOOD NEWS: If youre looking for the perfect app to run your superstar childcare center, you've found it! HiMama is  the #1 easy-to-use software for savvy child care programs tired of paperwork taking over their centers. HiMama provides an easy way to record and share children's activities, everything from silly and fun moments to learning and development to involve parents and improve outcomes for children. The program also has powerful reporting and staff management features for directors.

related_products.short_desc: Get a free demo and see how easy check-in/out, logging activities in the digital daily sheets, and parent communications can be!
related_products.features: Accelerate your child care business with brightwheel - the #1 platform for early education.  Brightwheel is a management software solution for childcares, daycares, and preschools specifically designed to streamline tasks tackled by directors/administrators and teachers at mid- to high-capacity centers. In addition to saving hours per week of effort for each staff member, 100% of parents are more satisfied with their school experience once brightwheel is implemented.

related_products.short_desc: The comprehensive, easy-to-use childcare management software trusted by the top centers. Designed for center owners, by a center owner.
related_products.features: LifeCubby is the easy-to-use management software trusted by the nations top childcare programs. Whether your center has five students or 500+ students, LifeCubby's unmatched suite of features has what you need to keep your center running smoothly -- at the most affordable price point in the industry. Designed by a center owner, LifeCubby is consistently being updated with innovative offerings -- including individualized lesson-planning options, in-app family messaging and more.

related_products.short_desc: Child care management software enabling contactless check-in/out, integrated tuition collection, business management tools and more.
related_products.features: Procare Solutions is the #1 name in child care management software - used by 35,000+ daycare businesses. For over 30 years, child care professionals have looked to Procare to provide real-time information for making critical decisions, maintaining compliance with local and state regulations, and adhering to business best practices. Feature-rich software, hardware and apps.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your child care business from one platform.
related_products.features: The childcare platform to increase enrollment. Increase enrollment, book revenue, get more reviews and retain clients from one platform.

related_products.short_desc: KidKare is a childcare management software that saves you time & money while caring for children. It ensures compliance with the USDA.
related_products.features: KidKare by Minute Menu is a childcare management software that allows you to save time and money while caring for your children. We have spent the last 25 years building a robust CACFP application to streamline the claim process while ensuring compliance with USDA requirements.  In addition to the food program, KidKare offers accounting software to help home childcare providers manage their business.

related_products.short_desc: Build a customized solution to manage your child care and children's activity business, with online forms and payments on your website.
related_products.features: Regpack helps child care facilities and providers to collect registration and payments. We work with child care centers, youth and after-school programs, camps, and more to build a customized solution that works for you. Top features include automated emails, integrated payment processing, recurring payment plans, membership and subscriptions, activity scheduling, waitlists, time conflict management, and custom forms. Manage your families and cash flow effortlessly. Learn more with a free demo.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your center more effectively and efficiently resulting in higher revenue, higher staff retention and improved student safety.
related_products.features: Smartcare is an easy to use child care center management and classroom software solution that has changed the way child care center owners, directors, teachers, and parents connect. Easy billing and payment processing; attendance, record keeping, and prospect family tracking are all included. Our user-friendly software does the hard work for you while you focus on what matters most: the children!  Smartcare serves centers with 20+ children, multi-site centers and shared services agencies.

related_products.short_desc: Simple activity management tools built by parents for educators. Billing, scheduling, parent communications, and more, made easy!
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows educators to build custom schedules and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. We support all types of schedules - full and half-day camps, semesters, drop-ins, private lessons and more. Our dedicated, top-rated support team provides training videos, webinars, and business resources to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: A cloud-based child care center software to improve communication with parents and manage classrooms.
related_products.features:
Daily Connect is an app used by thousands of childcare centers around the world to better manage parent relationships, streamline operations, and stay compliant. 

We provide childcare center directors a suite of parent communication tools, contactless sign-in and attendance tracking, and other tools to manage your childcare center smoothly, all from one easy to use app.

We offer a free 14 day trial so you can see if we're a good fit, and low prices starting from $8.99/mo.

related_products.short_desc: EZCare software includes fee management, parent engagement, scheduling, and attendance tracking
related_products.features: EZCare makes enrollment, billing, and scheduling easy. Extensive customization of fields, screens, and user permissions, means EZCare works the way you do, and multi-site functionality lets you work across all your sites at one time. EZCare comes with online registration, parent-portal with contactless payments and Check-In, and EZSmiles family engagement app. With 35+ years of childcare experience and the industry-leading support team, EZCare is the #1 choice for preschool & school-age programs

similar_products.features: Manage your childcare program with ease using ChildPilot's all-in-one childcare management system. Our cloud-based solution is accessible on any device through a web browser or mobile app. Features include fully integrated parent communication tools, contactless check-in/out, online enrollment/forms, center accounting, lesson planning, attendance tracking, custom reporting tools & more.

similar_products.short_desc: KidKare is a childcare management software that saves you time & money while caring for children. It ensures compliance with the USDA.
similar_products.features: KidKare by Minute Menu is a childcare management software that allows you to save time and money while caring for your children. We have spent the last 25 years building a robust CACFP application to streamline the claim process while ensuring compliance with USDA requirements.  In addition to the food program, KidKare offers accounting software to help home childcare providers manage their business.

similar_products.short_desc: Ready to take your childcare business to the next level? Go paperless with Sandbox - powerful, award-winning daycare software.
similar_products.features: Your all-in-one child care platform that is intuitive and easy to use. We provide comprehensive child care management, integrated parent engagement, and powerful business growth tools all in one app. Sandbox is built with educators in mind and has more than 140,000 users across North America. Find out why top-performing centers use Sandbox to handle their day-to-day child care tasks. Get started for free today or connect with a product expert for a free live tour!

similar_products.short_desc: A cloud-based child care center software to improve communication with parents and manage classrooms.
similar_products.features:
Daily Connect is an app used by thousands of childcare centers around the world to better manage parent relationships, streamline operations, and stay compliant. 

We provide childcare center directors a suite of parent communication tools, contactless sign-in and attendance tracking, and other tools to manage your childcare center smoothly, all from one easy to use app.

We offer a free 14 day trial so you can see if we're a good fit, and low prices starting from $8.99/mo.

similar_products.short_desc: User-friendly all-in-one cloud software with child & staff attendance kiosk, client billing, food program, ePay and parent portal.
similar_products.features: BEST VALUE WITH THE MOST FEATURES!  Get up and running quickly with our monthly cloud-based childcare management services for PC, Mac or Mobile!  Solutions for businesses of all sizes offering QuickBooks compatibility, child & staff attendance (COVID-19 touchless), messaging & events calendar, electronic payments, portable meal capture, and more! FREE demo & a 60-day satisfaction guarantee. Extensive CACFP Claims Processing functionality. FREE TRAINING, UPDATES & SUPPORT

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.
